name: hamza-wakrim/api-framework
description: Optimized Laravel Framework for API-only applications - Lightweight and fast.

suggest.ext-apcu: Required to use the APC cache driver.
suggest.ext-fileinfo: Required to use the Filesystem class.
suggest.ext-ftp: Required to use the Flysystem FTP driver.
suggest.ext-memcached: Required to use the memcache cache driver.
suggest.ext-pcntl: Required to use all features of the queue worker and console signal trapping.
suggest.ext-pdo: Required to use all database features.
suggest.ext-posix: Required to use all features of the queue worker.
suggest.ext-redis: Required to use the Redis cache and queue drivers (^4.0|^5.0|^6.0).
suggest.egulias/email-validator: Optional: Required only if using Mail features (^3.2.1|^4.0).
suggest.symfony/mailer: Optional: Required only if using Mail features (^7.2.0).
suggest.symfony/mime: Optional: Required only if using Mail features (^7.2.0).
suggest.tijsverkoyen/css-to-inline-styles: Optional: Required only if using Mail with HTML templates (^2.2.5).
suggest.league/commonmark: Optional: Required only if using Mail with Markdown templates (^2.7).
suggest.nunomaduro/termwind: Optional: Required only if using enhanced console output (^2.0).
suggest.ably/ably-php: Optional: Required to use the Ably broadcast driver (^1.0).
suggest.aws/aws-sdk-php: Optional: Required to use the SQS queue driver, DynamoDb failed job storage, and SES mail driver (^3.322.9).
suggest.brianium/paratest: Optional: Required to run tests in parallel (^7.0|^8.0).
suggest.fakerphp/faker: Optional: Required to generate fake data using the fake() helper (^1.23).
suggest.filp/whoops: Optional: Required for friendly error pages in development (^2.14.3).
suggest.laravel/tinker: Optional: Required to use the tinker console command (^2.0).
suggest.league/flysystem-aws-s3-v3: Optional: Required to use the Flysystem S3 driver (^3.25.1).
suggest.league/flysystem-ftp: Optional: Required to use the Flysystem FTP driver (^3.25.1).
suggest.league/flysystem-path-prefixing: Optional: Required to use the scoped driver (^3.25.1).
suggest.league/flysystem-read-only: Optional: Required to use read-only disks (^3.25.1)
suggest.league/flysystem-sftp-v3: Optional: Required to use the Flysystem SFTP driver (^3.25.1).
suggest.pda/pheanstalk: Optional: Required to use the beanstalk queue driver (^5.0).
suggest.php-http/discovery: Optional: Required to use PSR-7 bridging features (^1.15).
suggest.phpunit/phpunit: Optional: Required to use assertions and run tests (^10.5.35|^11.5.3|^12.0.1).
suggest.predis/predis: Optional: Required to use the predis connector (^2.3|^3.0).
suggest.psr/http-message: Optional: Required to allow Storage::put to accept a StreamInterface (^1.0).
suggest.pusher/pusher-php-server: Optional: Required to use the Pusher broadcast driver (^6.0|^7.0).
suggest.resend/resend-php: Optional: Required to enable support for the Resend mail transport (^0.10.0|^1.0).
suggest.symfony/cache: Optional: Required to PSR-6 cache bridge (^7.2).
suggest.symfony/filesystem: Optional: Required to enable support for relative symbolic links (^7.2).
suggest.symfony/http-client: Optional: Required to enable support for the Symfony API mail transports (^7.2).
suggest.symfony/mailgun-mailer: Optional: Required to enable support for the Mailgun mail transport (^7.2).
suggest.symfony/postmark-mailer: Optional: Required to enable support for the Postmark mail transport (^7.2).
suggest.symfony/psr-http-message-bridge: Optional: Required to use PSR-7 bridging features (^7.2).
